EmailTemplate.description: Sent to Web to Lead inquiries requesting information on payment by insurance.
EmailTemplate.name: Insurance Questions Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Response to Insurance Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
ClearChoice Dental Implant Center is not a contracted provider with any dental insurance company. ClearChoice collects the fee for service in full or sets up monthly payments. Our company is happy to help you submit a dental insurance claim for services rendered. Usually the patient gets the yearly maximum benefit allowed by his/her plan. Sincerely,
{!Lead.OwnerFullName} Dental implant Consultant ClearChoice Dental Implant Center
